content.content: 1. The Indigenous Advanced Education and Skills Council, incorporated under the Canada Not-for-profit Corporations Act, is recognized as the Council for the purposes of the Act.
content.raw_html: 1. The Indigenous Advanced Education and Skills Council, incorporated under the Canada Not-for-profit Corporations Act, is recognized as the Council for the purposes of the Act.

content.content: 2. The following Indigenous Institutes are prescribed for the purposes of section 6 of the Act: 1.  Anishinabek Educational Institute as represented by the Union of Ontario Indians. 2.  The First Nations Technical Institute. 3.  Iohahi:io Akwesasne Education & Training Institute as represented by the Mohawks of Akwesasne. 4.  Kenjgewin Teg. 5.  Ogwehoweh Skills and Trades Training Centre as represented by the Grand River Employment & Training Inc. 6.  Oshki-Pimache-O-Win: The Wenjack Education Institute. 7.  Seven Generations Education Institute. 8.  Shingwauk Teaching Lodge (Shingwauk Kinoomaage Gamig). 9.  Six Nations Polytechnic Inc. O. Reg. 239/18, s. 2; O. Reg. 133/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
2. The following Indigenous Institutes are prescribed for the purposes of section 6 of the Act:

1.  Anishinabek Educational Institute as represented by the Union of Ontario Indians.

2.  The First Nations Technical Institute.

3.  Iohahi:io Akwesasne Education & Training Institute as represented by the Mohawks of Akwesasne.

4.  Kenjgewin Teg.

5.  Ogwehoweh Skills and Trades Training Centre as represented by the Grand River Employment & Training Inc.

6.  Oshki-Pimache-O-Win: The Wenjack Education Institute.

7.  Seven Generations Education Institute.

8.  Shingwauk Teaching Lodge (Shingwauk Kinoomaage Gamig).

9.  Six Nations Polytechnic Inc. O. Reg. 239/18, s. 2; O. Reg. 133/20, s. 1.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
